contexts.context: ...of my favorite ways to learn in this medium. I <mark>also</mark> drew the cursor image! However, I cannot take credit...
...actually working, that was all #yxj! I was <mark>also</mark> the Quality Control Manager.
...my favorite writing, I do love the imagery. I <mark>also</mark> like how the scrolling drawings on the margins correlate to some...
...the margins correlate to some of the content. It was <mark>also</mark> interesting to perceive how the writing imitated the social structure of...
...feelings in a strange way, as these short insignificant words <mark>also</mark> expressed something, words with short wings for their heavy body...
